procedural_fairness: No interview required as no extrinsic information or subjective considerations were used.
evidence_assessment: Lacked strong ties to China (family, financial assets) and had family in Canada.
decision_outcome: Visa Officer's decision was reasonable and did not violate procedural fairness; judicial review application dismissed.
immigration_status: Work permit application refused due to insufficient evidence of ties to China and concerns about overstaying.
